description: List of physical locations where fare media were sold through approximately July 2014, prior to the implementation of Ventra cards.  The locations for Ventra card sales/reloading are more extensive and not yet available in dataset format.  Please see http://www.transitchicago.com/ventra for information on the Ventra program and https://www.ventrachicago.com/retailers/locations to find Ventra retail locations.

name: CTA - List of Fare Media Sales Outlets (deprecated August 2014)
